author: ltheussl
msg: [DOXIA-226] Leave ignorableWhiteSpace at false in XdocParser. This has to be fixed more generally with DOXIA-226. Add a test case that was broken before.

author: dwoods
msg: DAYTRADER-64 OpenJPA PCEnhancer ant task failure cause Full EJB3 runtime mode failure.  Applied patch from Forrest Xia.

author: fapeeler
msg: Seperated the critical and information section of notify routine. The critical notices caputure the last 100 lines of the vcld.log file the informational notices are for folks that have emails disabled. By doing this it can shave 20 or more secs off the wait time for the connect button to show.

msg: Fix some links, add missing CDATAs
